document.full_text: the trustee seeking money for victims of bernard madoff's fraud won court permission on tuesday to file a $975.5 million lawsuit against two feeder funds he said contributed to the ponzi scheme.
document.title: madoff trustee wins ok to file new $976 million suit
lines_and_colors: the trustee seeking money for victims of bernard madoff's fraud won court permission on tuesday to file a $975.5 million lawsuit against two feeder funds he said contributed to the ponzi scheme.
